mapper.insert: insert into album(albumname, albumtype, albumdate, albumgenre, artist_artistnumber, albumimg, 19check, albumcontent) values(#{albumName}, #{albumType}, #{albumDate}, #{albumGenre}, #{artistNumber}, #{albumImg}, #{ageLimit}, #{albumContent})
mapper.select: select albumnumber, albumname, albumimg from album where albumname=#{albumName}

select a.albumimg as albumimg, ar.artistname as artistname, ar.artistnumber as artistnumber, a.albumname as albumname, a.albumtype as albumtype, a.albumdate as albumdate, a.albumgenre as albumgenre, a.19check as 19check, a.albumcontent as albumcontent from music as m inner join album as a on m.albumnumber=a.albumnumber inner join artist as ar on m.artistnumber=ar.artistnumber where a.albumnumber=#{albumNumber}

select a.albumname as albumname, ar.artistname as artistname, a.albumdate as albumdate , a.albumnumber as albumnumber from album as a inner join artist as ar on a.artist_artistnumber=ar.artistnumber order by albumdate asc Limit #{limit}
